trans-unit.source: Specifies the types of framework-level property behavior that pertain to a particular dependency property in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] property system.
Use this enumeration when you construct a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> instance where you want to specify one or more the framework-level metadata option settings.
You no longer use this enumeration after the constructor call.

Instead, query the particular metadata option that was set during registration by checking the `true` or `false` value of a specific property of an existing <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>.

These property names match the FrameworkPropertyMetadataOptions enumeration values except for NotDataBindable, which is <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.IsNotDataBindable%2A> on the finished <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>.
The Journal option only specifies the intention to be journaled.

The actual journaling may or may not be addressed by journaling services such as those that are present in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] viewer application.
In particular, journaling has some known limitations if the element tree was constructed through code rather than [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
For details, see [Navigation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

> [!NOTE] > Although property value inheritance might appear to work for nonattached dependency properties, the inheritance behavior for a nonattached property through certain element boundaries in the runtime tree is undefined.
Always use <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> to register properties where you specify <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A> in the metadata.
The arrange pass of layout composition is affected by value changes to this dependency property.
To be added.
The measure pass of layout compositions is affected by value changes to this dependency property.
To be added.
The arrange pass on the parent element is affected by value changes to this dependency property.
To be added.
The measure pass on the parent element is affected by value changes to this dependency property.
To be added.
Some aspect of rendering or layout composition (other than measure or arrange) is affected by value changes to this dependency property.
To be added.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingMode"></xref> for data bindings on this dependency property defaults to <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.TwoWay>.
To be added.
The values of this dependency property are inherited by child elements.
To be added.

The values of this dependency property should be saved or restored by journaling processes, or when navigating by [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)].
To be added.
No options are specified; the dependency property uses the default behavior of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] property system.
To be added.
Data binding to this dependency property is not allowed.
To be added.
The values of this dependency property span separated trees for purposes of property value inheritance.
To be added.
The subproperties on the value of this dependency property do not affect any aspect of rendering.
To be added.
